messages.subject: Looking for state certified teacher
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/3/03 3:23:59 AM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/3/03 3:23:59 AM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< I am homeschooling my 6 year old this year and I am looking for a
Florida State Certified Teacher to do an end of the year evaluation.
Of course I am looking for someone who accepts a relaxed approach to
education. If anyone has a recommendation I'd appreciate it. We
live in Lake County, Florida. >>

I recommend signing up with an umbrella school.
Email me off list though, as Florida is not really OT for everyone else here.

Ren
"The world's much smaller than you think. Made up of two kinds of
people--simple and complicated.....The simple ones are contented. The
complicated ones aren't."
"Unschooling support at pensacolaunschoolers.com
